column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The baked goods look and taste fresh. They are definitely an upgrade over a place like Panera Bread. The French macarons are tempting
column2: but I have not tried them. Like I said
column3: I come here for the brunch. My favorite dish: the one with the grits. Beef and grits
column4: shrimp and grits. Both are tasty in their own right. One with tender
column5: flavorful braised beef. The other has perfectly cooked shrimp. You really can't go wrong either way.
